definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Write an algebraic expression_r for each verbal expression_r.
sentences.chinese: 把每個文字表達式寫成代數式。

sentences.english: This essay mainly introduces several evaluation methods of algebraic expression in common use.
sentences.chinese: 文章主要介紹代數式求值的幾種常用方法。
